page.title: 19UPWOOD MANOR (PART 4)
page.content: There are some fascinating things about Upwood Manor. During renovation old coins were found hidden between the walls together with some paintings. The builders added some modern coins and hid them all again. There is also supposed to be a ghost there. The story goes that the owner of the house, who happened to be second-in-command to Lord Nelson, would not let his daughter marry the man she wanted to. He went away to sea and got killed in a battle. At precisely the same moment that he died his ghost appeared at Upwood Manor to tell his daughter that she could marry the man after all. Some people say that he still makes appearances every now and again. by Peter and Tom
